ticket.title: ActiveRecord: nested_attributes and associations bug
ticket.original-body:
There is a bug in AR when trying to associate and update a record with another one through nested_attributes and has_many/belongs_to depending on how the params are sorted. I suspect the same behaviour probably is happening with has_one/belongs_to.
Bug reproductible with rails 3.0.7, demo app illustrating it:
https://github.com/jeremyvdw/Piracy (check the README file for details)
